sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE166020 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DATA_CD , NNF_CL , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL , SUPT_FMLY_FNM , SUPT_FMLY_BHDT , CRDC_USE_AMT_SUM , CRDC_USE_AMT , CSHPT_USE_AMT , DRTP_CARD_USE_AMT , TDMR_USE_AMT , ETC_USE_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN ,'Y0140000' /* 국세청 */ , NNF_CL_CD , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL_CD , TXPR_NM , (CASE WHEN (SUBSTR(TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN,7,1)) IN ('3','4') THEN '20' || SUBSTR(TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN,1,6) ELSE '19' || SUBSTR(TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN,1,6) END) , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE161030 WHERE YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = #famResnoEncCntn# )

INSERT INTO YE166020 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DATA_CD , NNF_CL , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL , SUPT_FMLY_FNM , SUPT_FMLY_BHDT , CRDC_USE_AMT_SUM , CRDC_USE_AMT , CSHPT_USE_AMT , DRTP_CARD_USE_AMT , TDMR_USE_AMT , ETC_USE_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN ,'Y0140001' /* 국세청외 */ , NNF_CL_CD , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL_CD , TXPR_NM , (CASE WHEN (SUBSTR(TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN,7,1)) IN ('3','4') THEN '20' || SUBSTR(TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN,1,6) ELSE '19' || SUBSTR(TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN,1,6) END) , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , 0 , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE161030 WHERE YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = #famResnoEncCntn# )

INSERT INTO YE166020 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DATA_CD , NNF_CL , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL , SUPT_FMLY_FNM , SUPT_FMLY_BHDT , CRDC_USE_AMT_SUM , CRDC_USE_AMT , CSHPT_USE_AMT , DRTP_CARD_USE_AMT , TDMR_USE_AMT , ETC_USE_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) ( SELECT DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , (CASE WHEN TRIM(DATA_CD) = '국세청자료' THEN 'Y0140000' ELSE 'Y0140001' END) , (CASE WHEN TRIM(NNF_CL) = '내국인' THEN '1' ELSE '9' END) , ( SELECT SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL_CD FROM YE161030 AN02 WHERE AN02.DPOB_CD = YE167520.DPOB_CD AND AN02.YRTX_BLGG_YR = YE167520.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND AN02.CLUT_SEPT_CD = YE167520.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND AN02.SYSTEMKEY = YE167520.SYSTEMKEY AND AN02.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = YE167520.FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN ) , SUPT_FMLY_FNM , SUPT_FMLY_BHDT , CRDC_USE_AMT_SUM , CRDC_USE_AMT, CSHPT_USE_AMT, DRTP_CARD_USE_AMT , TDMR_USE_AMT , ETC_USE_AMT , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# FROM YE167520 WHERE YRTX_BLGG_YR = #yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD = #clutSeptCd# AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN = #famResnoEncCntn# )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE YE166020 AA SET CRDC_USE_AMT_SUM= NVL((SELECT NVL(CRDC_DDC_TRGT_AMT,0) + NVL(DRTP_CARD_DDC_TRGT_AMT,0) + NVL(CSHPT_DDC_TRGT_AMT,0) + NVL(TDMR_DDC_TRGT_AMT,0) + NVL(PBT_DDC_TRGT_AMT,0) + NVL(BOOK_SHOW_AMT,0) FROM YE161040 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AA.FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN AND BB.CD_VVAL_KRN_CD = AA.DATA_CD ),CRDC_USE_AMT_SUM)
, CRDC_USE_AMT= NVL((SELECT NVL(CRDC_DDC_TRGT_AMT,0) FROM YE161040 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AA.FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN AND BB.CD_VVAL_KRN_CD = AA.DATA_CD ),CRDC_USE_AMT) , CSHPT_USE_AMT= NVL((SELECT NVL(CSHPT_DDC_TRGT_AMT,0) FROM YE161040 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AA.FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN AND BB.CD_VVAL_KRN_CD = AA.DATA_CD ),CSHPT_USE_AMT) , DRTP_CARD_USE_AMT= NVL((SELECT NVL(DRTP_CARD_DDC_TRGT_AMT,0) FROM YE161040 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AA.FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN AND BB.CD_VVAL_KRN_CD = AA.DATA_CD ),DRTP_CARD_USE_AMT) , TDMR_USE_AMT= NVL((SELECT NVL(TDMR_DDC_TRGT_AMT,0) FROM YE161040 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AA.FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN AND BB.CD_VVAL_KRN_CD = AA.DATA_CD ),TDMR_USE_AMT) , BOOK_SHOW_AMT= NVL((SELECT NVL(BOOK_SHOW_AMT,0) FROM YE161040 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AA.FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN AND BB.CD_VVAL_KRN_CD = AA.DATA_CD ),BOOK_SHOW_AMT) , ETC_USE_AMT= NVL((SELECT NVL(PBT_DDC_TRGT_AMT,0) FROM YE161040 BB WHERE BB.DPOB_CD=AA.DPOB_CD AND BB.YRTX_BLGG_YR=AA.YRTX_BLGG_YR AND BB.CLUT_SEPT_CD=AA.CLUT_SEPT_CD AND BB.SYSTEMKEY=AA.SYSTEMKEY AND BB.TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN = AA.FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN AND BB.CD_VVAL_KRN_CD = AA.DATA_CD ),ETC_USE_AMT)
, ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
AA.FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE166020 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn#

DELETE FROM YE166020 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN NOT IN ( SELECT TXPR_DSCM_NO_CNTN FROM YE161030 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# )
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO YE166020 ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DATA_CD , NNF_CL , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL , SUPT_FMLY_FNM , SUPT_FMLY_BHDT , CRDC_USE_AMT_SUM , CRDC_USE_AMT , CSHPT_USE_AMT , DRTP_CARD_USE_AMT , TDMR_USE_AMT , BOOK_SHOW_AMT , ETC_USE_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #famResnoEncCntn# , #dataCd# , #nnfCl# , #suptFmlyRltCl# , #suptFmlyFnm# , #suptFmlyBhdt# , #crdcUseAmtSum# , #crdcUseAmt# , #cshptUseAmt# , #drtpCardUseAmt# , #tdmrUseAmt# , #bookShowAmt# , #etcUseAmt# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE YE166020 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn# , DATA_CD=#dataCd# , NNF_CL=#nnfCl# , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL=#suptFmlyRltCl# , SUPT_FMLY_FNM=#suptFmlyFnm# , SUPT_FMLY_BHDT=#suptFmlyBhdt# , CRDC_USE_AMT_SUM=#crdcUseAmtSum# , CRDC_USE_AMT=#crdcUseAmt# , CSHPT_USE_AMT=#cshptUseAmt# , DRTP_CARD_USE_AMT=#drtpCardUseAmt# , TDMR_USE_AMT=#tdmrUseAmt# , BOOK_SHOW_AMT = #bookShowAmt# , ETC_USE_AMT=#etcUseAmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn# AND DATA_CD=#dataCd#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM YE166020 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn# AND DATA_CD=#dataCd#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DATA_CD , NNF_CL , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL , SUPT_FMLY_FNM , SUPT_FMLY_BHDT , CRDC_USE_AMT_SUM , CRDC_USE_AMT , CSHPT_USE_AMT , DRTP_CARD_USE_AMT , TDMR_USE_AMT , BOOK_SHOW_AMT , ETC_USE_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE166020 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN=#famResnoEncCntn# AND DATA_CD=#dataCd#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN , DATA_CD , NNF_CL , SUPT_FMLY_RLT_CL , SUPT_FMLY_FNM , SUPT_FMLY_BHDT , CRDC_USE_AMT_SUM , CRDC_USE_AMT , CSHPT_USE_AMT , DRTP_CARD_USE_AMT , TDMR_USE_AMT , BOOK_SHOW_AMT , ETC_USE_AMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM YE166020 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , FAM_RESNO_ENC_CNTN DESC , DATA_CD DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM YE166020 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
